thread.section_title: Loopmasters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Loopmasters | www.loopmasters.com | 3 of 115
thread.title: Guillermo Acuna

author: Guillermo Acuna
title: Guillermo Acuna
text:
It took me a while to download the loops after I bought it. I use iGetter to download software on my Mac. They pointed out that the use of a download manager had blocked the download.
The loops have a good sound and easily adapt to my pop-rock compositions. One missing essential element is Whole Note or Double Whole Note. For example, the end of a song requires an extended note.
I bought them in Apple Loops format and used them in Logic Pro 8.
I would have liked a bit more diversity.
I recommend it.
